counter_cards.name: telestop
counter_cards.text: Out of turn stop an opposing players teleport, during your turn teleport to misthalin.

counter_cards.name: Canceled Plans
counter_cards.text: Out of turn, stop another player while they are playing a goal card, during your turn discard all goals in play.

counter_cards.name: Belay That!
counter_cards.text: Out of turn, stop another player while they are playing an action card, during your turn every discards one.

counter_cards.name: That's Mine!
counter_cards.text: Out of turn, when another player trys to steal a keeper you steal it instead, during your turn choose a keeper to steal.

counter_cards.name: Veto!
counter_cards.text: Out of turn, stop another player while they are playing a rule card, during your turn reset up to 2 rules.

counter_cards.name: It's a Trap!
counter_cards.text: Out of turn, when another player trys to destroy one of your keepers destroy a random one of theirs instead, during your turn, choose a keeper to discard.
